body.name: GABRYLLY Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair, Home Desk Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support, 3D Armrest, Headrest, 4-Level Tilt Back, High Back Ergonomic Chairs with Wide Cushion Seat
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 10 hrs 31 mins
features: 【New Ergonomic Office Chair】- With a fusion of a modern, youthful design and robust construction, the GABRYLLY new version office desk chair holds adjustable lumbar support, 3D armrests and 4-level tilt function. Experience unparalleled comfort while prioritizing your health with this mesh ergonomic chair. The high-back mesh chair passes BIFMA and SGS certifications, underlining its high quality and durability.

【Adjustable Lumbar Support 3-gear】- Adjusting has never been so effortless! The office desk chair offers Dynamic Lumbar Support with its 300g dual-layer mesh. It can be set and locked at 3 distinct heights, spanning a total adjustment range of 1.8 in. For a quick reset, simply lift to the highest (unlock mode) and gently pull down. It means you can find different lumbar support while working or relaxing,stay away from back pain. More height adjustments is shown in the video.

【Versatile 3D Armrest & Headrest】- 3D armrests satisfy more of your needs. The arms adjusts 3" up and down, with arm pads that sway side-to-side and slide 1.5" front and back for personalized comfort. The headrest offers a 2.36"height adjustment and a 45° tilt. Recommended user heights: 5'1" to 6'1", maximum load capacity: 280 lbs. It becomes tailor-made for offices, homes, bedroom and rooms.

【4-level Recline】- An intelligent weight-sensing mechanism allows the chair tilt back eaily. The swivel task chair can be locked at 4 positions(90-120°), accommodating various seating preferences. The mesh chair automatically adjusts the reclining force according to the user's weight, eliminating the need for manual adjustment. With the high-density and durable mesh fabric, you will get breathability and comfort while leaning on the mesh backrest.

【Soft & Wide Cushion Seat】- The streamlined sponge cushion features skin-friendly fabric with a 2.6" thick shaped sponge core, providing extended comfort and robust support without deformation. A waterfall-edge design promotes leg blood circulation better.
【Stable Design】- A larger and stronger electroplate chair base ensures safety and prevents tipping. The silver chair legs are more fashionable and aesthetics.

【Hassle-free Assembly & Warranty】- Comes with an easy-to-understand manual and tool kit, it allows you get a black comfortable office desk chair within 30min. Additionally, please contact the GABRYLLY Support Team to activate a 2-year free warranty. Providing high-quality products and impeccable after-sales service to ensure an exceptional user and shopping experience is our primary goal.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sit in style, work in comfort A high-quality and durable office chair is always worth your investment, getting instant comfort!GABRYLLY new ergonomic office chair hold height adjustable lumbar support ,3D arms and 4-level tilt function, offering you better sitting experience.
The upgraded chair configuration for an optimal ergonomic experience. A well-made high back desk chair can fit you different needs, allowing you focus on work or get relaxation when rest.

Lift or Lower the Lumbar Support to Find Your Desired Position Double-layer mesh with dynamic lumbar support, conforming to your waist from every angle, offering enough support. Lift it to the highest (above 3rd position) into unlock mode, and with a gentle pull, it effortlessly resets. A click can be heard with every correct height adjustment.

Elevate Your Seating Experience with GABRYLLY Premium Office Chair Chair size: 19.5x20.5x44.7-48.8in(WDH). The heavy duty desk chair is designed for user of 5'1" to 6' in height , weight capacity of up to 280 lbs. This is a very classic American style office chair, suitable for most men and women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great comfort chair
reviews.reviewText: I got this chair and loved the feel but had trouble with its movement across carpet. The vendor sent an additional set of wheels that work perfectly. Great product and great support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Takes some getting used to, but performs as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I was having some back paid due to various issues including poor posture. I work a desk job from home for 8+ hours every day (as is likely true for most people in the market for an ergo chair), so I was very excited to have this chair delivered.Assembly was simple and straightforward, and all of the necessary components were included in the box. They even included extra screws -- just in case -- which was a welcome sight. In all, it took about 20 minutes to assemble.Once assembled, I'll be honest in saying that I was initially underwhelmed. I'm not sure what I was expecting exactly, but I couldn't shake the feeling that the chair wasn't particularly comfortable. I attempted to adjust the lumbar support component to each of its 3 vertical settings, but still couldn't find that Goldilocks position that I had built up in my head. I had strongly considered requesting a refund, but I decided to try it for at least a full work day before taking that step. What I realized is that this chair isn't meant to be comfortable, at least not in the conventional sense. After all, comfort (at least as I knew it) was generally the result of poor posture. And since this chair actively encourages you to sit with proper posture, my body immediately rejected the idea.In short, this product requires the user to take an active role in their posture and physical health. It's not something that will cure what ails you on its own. Rather, it's an incredibly effective TOOL that assists the user in fixing their posture.And it works extremely well.I've been using the chair every day for a couple of weeks now, and I've noticed that my posture is much better, even when I'm NOT using this product. That's the true value proposition of this product.As far as product features, I rather enjoyed the fully adjustable nature of the arms. It's actually the main reason I purchased this chair over others in the market, and they perform well as expected. In addition to adjusting up and down (which is seen in most products), the arms actually adjust forward and backward, as well as on a rotational pivot inward or outward to suit your needs.The headrest works as expected, but I personally found that I prefer to leave it off. The good news is this is easily accomplished and looks just as clean and polished as if you were to leave it on.So why only 4 stars? I can only think of two mildly critical things to say about this product:1.) While the lumbar support does have 3 adjustment settings that toggle position up and down the back of the chair, I found myself wanting some setting that could adjust the intensity of the support. It's a very sturdy support component, but sometimes I wish it was just slightly less dramatic.2.) I was lucky to purchase this product on sale, and am generally happy with the price point I received. However, for as well as this product works, I can't say I would recommend it at its full MSRP. Again, not necessarily a knock on the product, but my metaphorical socks need to be thoroughly knocked off to justify a $300 office chair. This one falls just short.If you can find this product on sale, and are prepared to take an active role in your posture and spine health this is a solid buy. If you're looking for a product that's going to solve all your problems for you, this one may not be for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Let the chair fix you
reviews.reviewText: The chair was easy to put together and only took me a little less than an hour. I put it on the edge of my bar so it would hang off the side during the build. I had one small issue which their service desk resolved immediately. That was very impressive to me. For advice, please see Jacob Scheidl & Lyle Swann above, as I can't state it any better. I'm 5' 11", 175# and very comfortable in this chair!Bottom line? I'm very happy with the chair and GABRYLLY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gabrylly Ergonomc Office Chair Model # 5000A
reviews.reviewText: Score of 4. The lumbar support is low if I sit up straight (female height of 5’3”). Also the plastic HANDLE for the seat-height lift and backrest recline feature is toooooo difficult to set-up, the iron stick is very hard to insert into the plastic handle. I almost wanted to return the Gabrylly ergonomic office chair (model # 5000A-3D color white). Other parts, easy others are heavy to assemble, with a user manual guide. A step by step procedure is printed with pictures and arrow direction. A big plus, screws are packed and labeled separately. The backrest, lumbar support and headrest are made of mesh. Armrests are adjustable in height but cannot be tilted up. Be careful, because it is too heavy (39.7 lbs) if wish to return. By mistake, I ordered seat with cushion, armrests that cannot be tilted up. Other gabrylly model, the seat, backrest/lumbar support and headrest are all made of mesh with armrests that can tilted up too. Overall I like the chair!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Chair back broke less than a month after purchase. Seller is difficult to get in touch with and Amazon was little help. Low quality product.
